transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu, Ankit naam hai mera. Kya meri baat Mr. Rakesh ji se ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji, Rakesh bol raha hu.
Executive: Ji Rakesh ji, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Theek hu.
Executive: Ji, Rakesh ji, IndiaMART pe aapka business registered hai, hydraulic cylinder ke naam se. To usi ke regarding aapse baat karni thi. Kaisa experience chal raha hai aapka IndiaMART ke saath?
Customer: Experience to theek hai, par business to kuch aa nahi raha hai.
Executive: Okay. Business nahi aa pa raha hai. Sir, aapka jo product hai, hydraulic cylinder, iske alawa aur bhi koi products me deal karte hai aap?
Customer: Nahi, main yahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Sir, abhi jo aapka account hai na IndiaMART pe, wo ek free account hai. Free account me kya hota hai sir, visibility thodi kam rehti hai. Jo buyleads aati hai, wo bhi shared hoti hai. Matlab ek hi lead paanch se chheh alag alag sellers ko jaati hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To usme competition badh jaata hai. Isliye hum sellers ko suggest karte hai ki wo paid services le. Paid services me aapko direct buyleads milti hai, aapki visibility badh jaati hai, aapko TrustSeal verification milta hai, jisse buyer ka trust badhta hai.
Customer: Achha. To iska kya charge hai?
Executive: Sir, iske alag alag packages hote hai. Basic package start hota hai hamara, lagbhag pachees hazaar se, ek saal ke liye.
Customer: Arre, ye to bahut zyada hai.
Executive: Sir, zyada lag raha hai, lekin agar aap iska return on investment dekhenge, to aapko saal bhar me isse kai guna zyada ka business mil sakta hai. Aapko ek dedicated account manager bhi milta hai jo aapka catalog manage karega.
Customer: Hmm. Nahi, abhi to nahi. Main soch ke bataunga.
Executive: Bilkul sir, aap sochiye. Main ek kaam kar sakta hu, main aapke number pe hamare senior manager se ek call arrange karwa deta hu. Wo aapko packages aur behtar tareeke se samjha denge.
Customer: Theek hai, karwa dijiye.
Executive: Ji sir. To aapko kal subah gyarah baje ke aas paas call aa jayega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you for your time.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving any business from IndiaMART.
- Found the paid subscription cost to be too high.


Resolution:

- Informed that the current account is a free one with low visibility.
- Explained that buyleads are shared among multiple sellers on a free plan.
- Pitched the benefits of a paid subscription, including direct leads and TrustSeal.
- Quoted the basic package price of around Rs. 25,000 per year.


Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.
- A senior manager will call the next day around 11 AM to explain the packages further.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Negative -> Neutral | Interested


@@@Key Topics:

- no business, free account, paid subscription, package cost, visibility, follow-up call
